title: Jeremy D. Hoffman
text:
I am an Assistant Clinical Professor of Public Policy and the Director of Undergraduate Studies at the Penn State School of Public Policy.
I also currently lead the Schoolâ€™s Next Gen Leadership Academy, a non credit leadership program for undergraduate students interested in pursuing careers in public service.
My primary research and teaching interests include population health, health disparities, mortality and longevity, demographic methods, data visualization, technology & innovation policy, and intellectual property law & policy.
